title: What's the best & last time to pray sunnah of maghrib prayer? - assim al hakeem
transcript: ishad from India says what's the best time for for uh praying Sun after marriage prayer that the best time is after you finish your car so you pray Maghrib you sit and do your set of car for five or ten minutes afterwards you stand up and pray in a different place or you go home and this is the best and pray the Sunnah in your home but the time of Sunnah prayer is extended until the redness at the West at the Horizon disappears once it disappears this is Risha time once Asia time is due you cannot pray if you deliberately delayed it without a legitimate reason
